contest-event.event-date:
May 13, 1990 D Action Medical Research Youth Entertainment Festival of Great Britain
Action Medical Research Youth Entertainment Festival of Great Britain 10 Entertainments Contest Action Medical Research Youth Entertainment Championships action-medical-research-youth-entertainment-festiv
First contest 1984.
Youth
Queen Elizabeth Hall, Oldham, Greater Manchester, England, UK Entertainment contest - 1st Northern Youth 44, 2nd Besses Boys 42, 3rd Rotherham Schools 41. Best novelty item - Desford. Best soprano - Dawn McKone (Mexborough) Best soloist - Michael Howard (euphonium) Lady Manners School. 6th annual contest. 11 bands competed.
July 4, 2011, 11:20 a.m. Jan. 27, 2015, 1:45 p.m.
1 Northern Youth Brass John Roberts
2 Mexborough Music Centre Brass Graham O'Connor
3 Desford Colliery Youth Kevin Steward
Unknown Result Besses Boys Band Barrie Chappell
Unknown Result Lady Manners School Unknown
Unknown Result Rotherham Schools Youth B. Lingley
